0284:ati:+kaṭhora +katha +karṣaṇa +kalyam +kānta +kāya +kiriṭa +kirīṭa +kutsita +kulva +kṛcchra +kṛta +kṛśa +kṛṣṇa +kruddha +krudh +kruṣṭa +khara +gaṇḍa +gandha +gandhālu +garīyas +garvita +gahana +gāḍha +gārgya +guṇa +gupta +guru +go +caṇḍa +caraṇa +cāpalya +cira +chattra +chattraka +jara +jaras +jala +java +jāgara +jīrṇa +jīrṇa-tā +jīva +ḍīna +tapasvin +tamām +tīkṣṇa +tīvra +tṛṇṇa +tṛpti +tṛṣṇa +trasnu +dagdha +dantura +darpa +darśin +dātṛ +dāna +dāruṇa +dāha +digdha +dīrgha +duḥkhita +duḥsaha +durgata +durdharṣa +dur-lambha +duṣkara +dūra +doṣa +dvaya +dhavala +dhenu +nidra +nipuṇa +nīca +pathin +pada +parokṣa +parokṣa-vṛtti +pātaka +puruṣa +pūruṣa +pūta +peśala +prakāśa +prage +praṇaya +praṇudya +prabandha +pravaraṇa +pravṛtti +pravṛddha +praśna +praśnya +prasakti +prasaṅga +prasiddha +prauḍha +prauḍha-yauvana +bala +bahu +bālaka +bāhu +bībhatsa +brahmacarya +bhāra +bhāra-bhūta +bhāra-ga +bhī +bhīṣaṇa +bhṛta +bhojana +bodhi-sattva +bhrū +maṅgalya +mati +madhyandina 0043:uttama:+gandhā@ḍhya +gāya +caritra +jana +tā +tva +tejas +darśana +pada +puruṣa +pūruṣa +phalinī +bala +maṇi ut-tamarṇa ut-tamarṇin +lābha +vayasa +varṇa +vid +veṣa +śākha ut-tamaśākhīya +śruta +śloka +saṃgraha +sāhasa +sukha +strī-saṃgrahaṇa uttamā@ṅga uttamā@dhama uttamā@mbhas uttamā@raṇī uttamā@rdha uttamārdhya uttamā@ha uttamo@ttama uttamo@ttamaka uttamo@ttamika uttamo@ttarīya uttamo@papada uttamau@jas uttamau@dārya
0128:uttara:+kalpa +kāṇḍa +kāmā@khya-tantra +kāya +kāla +kuru +kośalā +krama +kriyā +khaṇḍa +khaṇḍana +ga +gārgya +gītā +ghṛta +grantha uttaraṃ-ga +cchada +ja +jyā +jyotiṣa +tantra +tara +tas +tāpanīya +tra +danta +dāyaka +dik-stha +dig-īśa +diś +deśa +dru +dharma +dhāraya +dhurīṇa +dheya +nābhi +nārāyaṇa +pakṣa +paṭa +patha uttarapathika +pada uttarapadika uttarapadakīya +parvata +paścā@rdha +paścima +pāda +purastāt +purāṇa +pūjā +pūrva +pracchada +pratyuttara +proṣṭhapadā +phalgunī +phālgunī +barhis +bhaktika +bhadrapadā +bhādrapadā +bhāga +mati +mandrā +mātra +mānasa +mārga +mīmāṃsā +mūla +yuga +rahita +rāma-campū +rāma-carita +rāma-caritra +rūpa +lakṣaṇa +lakṣman +loman +vayasa +vallī +vasti +vastra +vādin +vāsas +vīthi +vedi +śalaṅkaṭa +śānti +śaila +saktha +saṃjñita +sākṣin +sādhaka +hanu uttarā@ṃsa uttarā@gāra uttarā@ṅga uttarā@dri uttarā@dhara uttarā@dhikāra uttarā@dhikārin uttarā-patha uttarā@bhāsa uttarā@bhimukha uttarā@mnāya uttarā@yaṇa uttarā@raṇi uttarā@rka uttarā@rcika uttarā@rtha uttarā@rdha uttarārdhya uttarā-vat uttarā@śā uttarā@śman uttarā@śramin uttarā@śrita uttarā@ṣāḍhā uttarā@saṅga uttarā-sad uttarā@ha uttare@tarā uttaro@ttara uttarottarin uttaro@ṣṭha uttarau@ṣṭha

0013:kuvalaya:+dṛś +nayanā +pura +maya +mālā +vatī kuvalayā@ditya kuvalayā@nanda kuvalayā@pīḍa kuvalayā@valī kuvalayā@śva kuvalayā@śvaka kuvalayā@śvīya
0050:kuśa:+kāśa-maya +ketu +cīra +cīrin +ja +dūrvā-maya +dvīpa +dhārā +dhvaja +nagara +nābha +nāman +nāra +netra +pavitra +puṣpa +puṣpaka +prasū +plava +plavana +bindu +bhāra +mālin +muṣṭi +rajju +lava +vat +vāri +vīrā +stamba +sthala +hasta kuśā@kara kuśā@kṣa kuśā@gra kuśā@grīya kuśā@ṅkura kuśā@ṅgurīya kuśā@ṅgurīyaka kuśā@raṇi kuśā-vatī kuśā@varta kuśā@valeha kuśā@śva kuśā@sana kuśī-lava kuśe@ṇḍva kuśe-śaya kuśo@daka kuśo@rṇā

0075:gaṇa:+karṇikā +karman +kāma +kāra +kāri +kāritā +kumāra +kṛtvas +cakra +cakraka +cchandas +tā +tva +dāsa +dīkṣā gaṇadīkṣin +deva +devatā +dravya +dvīpa +dhara +dhātu-paribhāṣā +nātha +nāyaka +pa +pati +pati-nāga +parvata +pāṭha +pāda +pīṭhaka +puṃgava +puraṇa +pūjya +pūrva +pramukha +bhartṛ +bhṛt +bhogya +bhojana +mukhya +yajña +yāga +ratna +rājya +rātra +rūpa +rūpaka +rūpin +vat +vara +vṛtta +vyākhyāna +vyūha +śas +śrī +hāsa +hāsaka +homa gaṇā@graṇī gaṇā@cala gaṇā@cārya gaṇā@dhipa gaṇā@dhipati gaṇā@dhipatya gaṇā@dhī@śa gaṇā@dhyakṣa gaṇā@nna gaṇā@bhyantara gaṇā@varā gaṇe@ndra gaṇe@śa gaṇe@śāna gaṇe@śvara gaṇo@tsāha

0078:jāta:+karman +kalā@pa +kāma +kopa +kautuka +kautūhala +krodha +kṣobha +tarṣa +tokā +danta +doṣa +naṣṭa +pakṣa +pāśa +putra +pūrva +pratyaya +prāya +bala +brāhmaṇa-śabda +buddhi +bhāva +bhī +manmatha +mātra +māsā +mṛta +rajas +rasa +rāga +rūpa +roma +roṣa +vat +vāsaka +vāsa-gṛha +vidyā +vidyā +vinaṣṭa +vibhrama +viśvāsa +veda +vedas +vedas jātavedasa jātavedasīya jātavedasya +vepathu +veśman +śilā +śṛṅga +śmaśru +śrama +saṃvatsarā +saṃvṛddha +saṃkalpa +sa-sneha +sādhvasa +sena jātasenya +sneha +spṛha +harṣa +hāriṇī +hārda jātā@gas jātā@nukampa jātā@patyā jātā@parādha jātā@bhiṣaṅga jātā@marṣa jātā@śru jātā@stha jātā@ṣṭi jātai@kabhakti jāto@kṣa jāto@daka

0001:dī:+da

0089:dṛḍha:+kaṇṭaka +kāṇḍa +kārin +kuṭṭaka +krodha +kṣatra +kṣurā +gātrikā +granthi +grāhin +cchada +cyuta +jñāna dṛḍhatara +taru +tā +tva +tṛṇa +toraṇā@rgala +tvac +daṃśaka +dasyu +dvāra +dhana +dhanus +dhanvan +dhanvin +dhur +dhṛti +nābha +niścaya +nīra +netra +nemi +pattra +pāda +pratijña +pratyaya +praroha +prahāra +prahārin +phala +baddha +bandhana-baddha +bandhinī +bala +bīja +buddhi +bhakti +mati +manyu +muṣṭi +mūla +raṅgā +ratha +ruci +latā +loman +vajra +vapus +varman +valka +valkala +vāda-parākrama +vikrama +vṛkṣa +vedhana +vairin +vrata +śaktika +saṃdha +saṃdhi +samādhāna +sūtrikā +sena +sauhṛda +skandha +sthūṇa +hanu +hasta dṛḍhā@kṣa dṛḍhā@ṅga dṛḍhā@nutāpa dṛḍhā@yu dṛḍhā@yus dṛḍhā@yudha dṛḍhā@śva dṛḍhe@kṣurā dṛḍhe@ṣudhi

0357:dharma:dharmesthita +kañcuka +kathaka +kathā +karo@pā@dhyāya +karman +kāṅkṣiṇī +kāṇḍa +kāma +kāya +kāra +kāraṇa +kārya +kāla +kīrti +kīla +kūṭa +kūpa +kṛcchra +kṛt +kṛtya +ketu +kośa +koṣa 0068:na:+kāra +kiṃcana +kiṃcid +kim +kis +kīm +kutaścid +ga +cā@rtha-vāda +ciketa +ciketas +cira +tad-vid +tamām +tarām +dīna +dūṣita +dṛśya +nu +parājit +puṃs +puṃsa +puṃsaka +bhīta +mātra +muca +muci +mura +mṛta +yuta +riṣyat +roga +liptā@ṅga +vidya +vidvas +śakti +śubha +śeṣa +saṃvid +sukara +sparśana +hi nā@gni-dūṣita nā@ti nā@ty nā@dara nā@deya nā@dhī@ta nā@nurakta nā@ntarīyaka nā@nyatra nā@bhijāta nā@bhidhāvat nā@bhimāna nā@bhilakṣita nā@ruṃ-tuda nā@rya-tikta nā@satya nā@sti nā@stika ne@d nai@ka nai@va- no@ no@tpādita no@tseka no@pasthātṛ no@pasthāyin

0126:pada:+kamala +kāra +kārikā-ratna-mālā +kāla +kṛt +kṛtya +kaumudī +krama +kramaka +ga +gata +gati +gāḍha +gotra +ghātam +catur-ūrdhva +candrikā +cihna +ccheda +cyuta +jāta +jñā +jyotis +tā +tva +tvarā +dārḍhya +dīpikā +devatā +dyotinī +nidhana +nī +nyāsa +paṅkaja +paṅkti +pañcaka +paddhati +padma +pāṭha +pāta +pūraṇa +bandha +bhañjana +bhañjikā +bhāvā@rtha-candrikā +bhraṃśa +mañjarī +mālā +yojana +yojanā +yojanikā +yopana +racanā +ratnā@valī +vākya-ratnā@kara +vākyā@rtha-pañjikā +vādya +vāmīka +vāya +vi +vikṣepa +vigraha +viccheda +vid +virāma +viṣṭambha +vī +vṛtti +vedin +vyākhyāna +śabda +śas +śāstra +śreṇi +ṣṭhīva +saṃhitā +saṃghāṭa +saṃghāta +saṃtāna +sadhātu +saṃdarbha +saṃdhāna +saṃdhi +samaya +samūha +stobha +stha +sthāna +sthita +hita padā@krānta padā@ghāta padā@ṅka padā@ṅgī padā@ṅguṣṭha padā@ji padā@ti padā@di padā@dhyayana padā@dhyāhāra-vāda padā@nuga padā@nurāga padā@nuśāsana padā@nuṣaṅga padā@nusāra padā@nusvāra padā@nta padā@ntara padā@nveṣin padā@bja padā@bhilā@ṣin padā@bhihoma padā@mnāya-siddhi padā@mbhoja padā@yata padā@ravinda padā@rtha padā@vagrāham padā@valī padā@vṛtti padā@sa padā@sana padā@hata padai@kadeśa pado@ccaya pado@pahata

0137:padma:+kandā@da +kara +karkaṭī +karṇika +karṇikā +kalikā +kalyāṇa-khaṇḍa +kāṣṭha +kīṭa +kuṇḍa +kūṭa +ketana +ketu +kesara +kośa +kṣetra +khaṇḍa +gandha +gandhi +garbha +giri-purāṇa +gupta +gṛhā +caraṇa +cāriṇī +ja +jātaka +jāti +tantu +tā +darśana +dale@kṣaṇa +dhara +nandi +nandin +nābha +nābhi +nāla +nidhi +nibhe@kṣaṇa +nimīlana +netra +paṇḍita +pattra +pada +parṇa +pāṇi +pāda +pura +purāṇa +puṣpa +prabha +prabhu +priyā +bandha +bandhu +bīja +bhava +bhāśa +bhū +maya +mālin +mihira +mukhī +mūla +yoni +rati +ratna +ratha +rāga +rāja +rūpa +rekhā +lāñchana +līlā-vilāsinī +lekhā +locana +vat +vana-bāndhava +varcas +varṇa +varṇaka +vāsā +vāhinī +viṣaya +vṛkṣa +vṛṣabha-vikrāmin +veṣa +vyākośa +vyūha +śas +śāyinī +śekhara +śrī +ṣaṇḍa +saṃhitā +saṃkāśa +sadman +samāsana +sambhava +saras +sundara +sūtra +sena +saugandhika +snuṣā +svastika +svāmin +hasta +hāsa +hema-maṇi padmā@kara padmā@kāra padmā@kṣa padmā@ṅka-mudrā padmā@ṅghri padmā@cala padmā@cārya padmā@ṭa padmā@di padmā@dhī@śa padmā@nanda padmā@ntara padmā@laṃkārā padmā@laya padmā-vatī padmā@vabhāsa padmā@vali padmā@sana padmā@hvaya padmā@hvā padme-śaya padmo@ttama padmo@ttara padmo@tpala-kumud-vat padmo@dbhava padmo@paniṣad

0220:para:+kathā +kara-gata +karman +kalatra +kāya-praveśana +kārya +kāla +kula +kṛti +kṛtya +krama +krāthin +krānti +kṣudrā +kṣetra +khātaka +gata +gāmin +guṇa +gṛha-vāsa +geha-vāsa +granthi +glāni +cakra +citta-jñāna +cintā +cchanda +cchidra +ja +jana +janman +jāta +jñāna-maya +taṅgaṇa +tattva +tantra +tama +tara +tarkaka +tarkuka +talpa +tas +tā +tāpana +tīrthika +toṣayitṛ +tra +tva +dāra +duḥkha +dūṣaṇa +devatā +deśa +doṣa +dravya +droha +dveṣin +dhana +dharma +dhyāna +nindā +nipāta +nirmita-vaśa-vartin +nirvāṇa +ṃ-tapa +pakṣa +patnī +pada +parigraha +paribhava +parivāda +pāka +pāra-bhūta +piṇḍa +puraṃjaya +pura-praveśa +puruṣa +puṣṭa +pūruṣa +pūrva-tva +pūrvā +pauravatantava +prakāśaka +praṇava +prayojana +pravādin +pre@ṣya-tva +bala +balīyas +brahman +bhāga +bhāgya +bhāva +bhāva +bhāṣā +bhū +bhūta +bhūmi +bhūṣaṇa +bhṛt +bhṛta +bhṛtikā +bhṛtya +bhedaka +bhedana +maṇi +mata +mada +mantra +manthu +manyu +marma +mātra +māra +mukha-capeṭikā +mṛtyu +mokṣa-nirāsa-kārikā +m-para +m-parā +parāka +parita +parīṇa +yuvati-ga +yoṣit +ramaṇa +rāṣṭra +rūpa +loka +vat +vat +varga +vallabha +vaśa +vaśya +vastu +vākya +vācya +vāṇi +vāda +vāraṇa +vitta +vīra-han +veśman +vyākṣepin +vyūha-vināśana +vrata +śakti +śarīrā@veśa +śāsana +śiva +śuci +śrī +śvas +saṃgata +saṃcāraka +saṃjñaka +sambandha +savarṇa +sasthāna parasātkṛ +sevā +strī +sthāna +sva +haṃsa +han +hita parā@ṅkuśa parā@gama parā@ṅga parā@ṅga-da parā@cita parā@tman parā@dhi parā@dhīna parā@nanda parā@nīka parā@nta parā@ntaka parā@nna parā@para parā@mṛta parā@yaṇa parā@yatta parā@yus parā@rtha parā@rdha parā@rdhaka parā@rdhya parā@rbuda parā@vajñā parā-vat parā@vara parā@vasatha-śāyin parā@śraya parā@śrita parā@saṅga parā@skandin parā@ha parā@hata parā@hṇa pare@tara pare@śa pare@ṣṭi pare@ṣṭukā parai@dhita paro@kta-khaṇḍana paro@ḍhā paro@dvaha paro@pakaraṇa paro@pakāra paro@pakārin paro@pakṛta paro@pakṛti paro@paga paro@pajāpa paro@padeśa paro@paruddha paro@pavāsa paro@pasarpaṇa

0091:parama:+kaṇṭha +kāṇḍa +krānti +kruddha +krodhin +gati +gava +gahana +cetas +jā +jyā +tattva +tas +tā +dāruṇa +duḥkhita +durmedhas +dru +dharmā@tman +nanda +pada +parama +puṃs +puruṣa +pūruṣa +prabha +prīta +brahmacāriṇī +brahmaṇya +brahman +bhaṭṭāraka +bhāsvara +manyumat +mahat +mokṣa +rasa +rahasya +raja +rkṣa +rddhika +rṣi +laghu-mañjūṣā +vismita +vyomnika +śiva +śobhana +saṃhitā +saṃhṛṣṭa +saṃtuṣṭa +samudaya +sammata +sarvatra +svadharman +haṃsa paramā@kṣara paramā@khya paramā@gama paramā@ṅganā paramā@ṭika paramā@ṇu paramā@tma paramā@tma paramā@tmaka paramā@tman paramā@dī@śvara paramā@dvaita paramā@nanda paramā@nna paramā@pakrama paramā@pad paramā@pama paramā@psaras paramā@mṛta paramā@yuṣa paramāyus paramā@rādhya paramā@rta paramā@rtha paramā@rya paramā@rhata paramā@vaṭika paramā@vadhi paramā@sana paramā@ha paramā@hlādana parame@kṣu parame@śa parame@śvara parame@ṣvāsa paramai@śvarya paramo@pā@saka

0089:pūrṇa:+kaṃsa +kakud +kākud +kākuda +kāma +kāraṇa +kuṭa +kūṭa +kumbha +kośā +koṣṭhā +kha +gabhasti +garbha +giri +candra +cāttra +tā +tva +tūṇa +darva +deva +dharma +parve@ndu +pātra +purī +puruṣā@rtha-candra +prakāśa +prajña +bandhura +bīja +bhadra +bhedinī +maṇḍala +mā +mānasa +mās +māsa +mukta +mukha +muṣṭi +maitrāyaṇī-putra +yoga +yauvana +ratha +lakṣmīka +vandhura +vapus +varman +viṃśati-varṣa +vighana +vaināśika +śakti +śrī +śruti +samaya +sena +saugandha +sruva +homa pūrṇā@kṣa pūrṇā@kṣya pūrṇā@ṅka pūrṇā@ṅgada pūrṇā@ñjali pūrṇā@naka pūrṇā-nadī pūrṇā@nanda pūrṇā@pūrṇa pūrṇā@bhilāṣa pūrṇā@bhiṣikta pūrṇā@bhiṣeka pūrṇā@bhra-rasa pūrṇā@mṛta pūrṇā@yata pūrṇā@yus pūrṇā@rtha pūrṇā@vatāra pūrṇā@śā pūrṇā@śrama pūrṇā@huti pūrṇe@ccha pūrṇe@ndu pūrṇe@śa pūrṇo@tkaṭa pūrṇo@tsaṅga pūrṇo@da pūrṇo@darā pūrṇo@pamā

0282:pūrva:+karman +kalpa +kāma-kṛtvan +kāya +kārin +kārya +kāla +kālika +kālīna +kāṣṭhā +kṛt +kṛta +kṛtvarī +kṛṣṇīya +koṭi +kramā@gata +kriyā +ga +gaṅgā +gata +gatvan +gama +grāmin +ghaṭakarpara 0322:bahu:+kaṇṭaka +kaṇṭā +kanda +kara +karaṇīya +karṇikā +kalka +kalpa +kalyāṇa +kāma +kāra +kāraṇīya +kālam +kālīna +kīṭa +kulīna +kulya +kusumita +kūrca +kṛta +kṛtya +ketu +krama +kṣama +kṣāra +kṣīra-duh +kṣīrā +gandha +garhya-vāc +gava +giri +gu +guḍā +guṇa +guru +guhā +go +gotra-ja +granthi +graha +carmaka +cārin +citra +cchada +cchala +cchinnā +jana +janma-bhāj +janya +jalpa +jalpitṛ 0001:bhaṭīya:+dīpikā

0022:bhaṇḍa:+tapasvin +tva +dhūrta-niśācara +hāsinī bhaṇḍaka bhaṇḍana bhaṇḍanīya bhaṇḍara bhaṇḍākī bhaṇḍi bhaṇḍita bhaṇḍin bhaṇḍiman bhaṇḍira bhaṇḍila bhaṇḍī bhaṇḍītakī bhaṇḍīra bhaṇḍīla bhaṇḍu bhaṇḍuka bhaṇḍūka

0147:bhadra:+kaṇṭa +kanyā +kapila +karṇikā +karṇe@śvara +kalpa +kāpya +kāra +kāraka +kālī +kāśī +kāṣṭha +kumbha +kṛt +gaṇita +gandhikā +gupta +gaura +ghaṭa +ghaṭaka +ṃ-kara +ṃ-karaṇa +cāru +cūḍa +ja +jaya +jātika +jāni +tara +taruṇī +tas +tā +tuṅga +turaga +tva +datta +danta +dantikā +dāru +dīpa +deva +deha +dos +dvīpa +nāman +nāmikā +nidhi +pada +parṇā +parṇī +pāda +pāpa +pāla +pīṭha +pura +balana +balā +bāhu +bhaṭa +bhuja +bhūṣaṇā +manas +manda +mallikā +mātṛ +mukha +muñja +musta +mustaka +mustā +mṛga +yava +yāna +yoga +ratha +rāja +rāma +ruci +rūpā +reṇu +rohiṇī +lakṣaṇa +latā +vaṭa +vat +vadana +vargīya +varman +vallikā +vallī +vasana +vāc +vācya +vādin +vinda +virāj +vihāra +veṇu +vrāta +śarman +śākha +śāla-vana +śilā +śīla +śoci +śaunaka +śraya +śravas +śriya +śrī +śrut +śreṇya +ṣaṣṭhī +saras +sāman +sāra +sāla-vana +suta +sena +somā +svapna +hasta +hrada bhadrā@kāra bhadrā@kṛti bhadrā@kṣa bhadrā@ṅga bhadrā@tmaja bhadrā@nanda bhadrā@bhadra bhadrā@yudha bhadrā@yus bhadrā@vakāśā bhadrā-vatī bhadrā@vaha bhadrā@śrama bhadrā-śraya bhadrā@śva bhadrā@sana bhadrā@ha bhadre@ndra bhadre@śa bhadre@śvara bhadrai@lā bhadro@daya bhadro@pavāsa-vrata bhadrau@danī

0047:madhura:+kaṇṭaka +kaṇṭhin +kharjūrikā +kharjūrī +gātra +cāru-mañju-svaratā +jambīra +tā +traya +tva +tvaca +nirghoṣa +nisvana +paṭolī +pragīta +pralāpin +priya-darśana +phala +bīja-pūra +bhāṣitṛ +bhāṣin +maya +rāvin +latā +vacana +vallī +vāc +vipāka +śīla +śukla-mūtra +sambhāṣa +sravā +svana +svara madhurā@kṣara madhurā@ṅgaka madhurā@niruddha madhurā@ntaka madhurā@mla madhurā@mlaka madhurā@lāpa madhurā@lābunī madhurāvaṭṭa madhurā@ṣṭaka madhurā@svāda madhuro@daka madhuro@panyāsa

0143:mukha:+kamala +khura +gata +gandhaka +grahaṇa +ghaṇṭā +candra +capala +capeṭikā +cāpalya +cāli +cīrī +cchada +cchavi +ja +janman +jāha +tas +tas +tuṇḍaka +daghna +dūṣaṇa +dūṣaṇaka +dūṣikā +dhautā +nāsika +nirīkṣaka +nivāsinī +paṅkaja +paṭa +padma +pāka +piṇḍa +puṣpaka +pūraṇa +poñchana +pratimukha +prasāda +prasādhana +priya +pre@kṣa +pre@kṣin +phullaka +bandha +bandhana +bāhū@ru-paj-ja +bāhū@ru-pādatas +bhagā +bhaṅga +bhaṅgī +bhūṣaṇa +bheda +maṇḍana +maṇḍanaka +maṇḍala +maṇḍikā +maṇḍinikā +maṇḍī +madhu +mātra +mādhurya +māruta +mārjana +mudrā +moda +m-paca +yantraṇa +yoni +rajju +randhra +rāga +ruj +rekhā +roga +rogika +rogin +lāṅgala +lepa +vat +varṇa +vallabha +vastrikā +vāṭikā +vāta +vādya +vāsa +vāsana +vipulā +viluṇṭhikā +viṣṭhā +vairasya +vyādāna +śapha +śaśin +śālā +śuddhi +śṛṅga +śeṣa +śodhana +śodhin +śobhā +śoṣa +śoṣin +śrī +ṣṭhīla +saṃdaṃśa +saṃdhi +sambhava +sammita +sukha +sura +secaka +srāva mukhā@kāra mukhā@kṣepa mukhā@gni mukhā@gra mukhā@ṅga mukhā@dāna mukhā@di-tva mukhā@nila mukhā@bja mukhā@maya mukhā@mṛta mukhā@modā mukhā@mbuja mukhā@rcis mukhā@rjaka mukhā@lu mukhā@varī mukhā@valepa mukhā@sava mukhā@stra mukhā@srāva mukhā@svāda mukhenā@dāyin mukhe@ndu mukhe-balin mukhe-bhagā mukhe-bhava mukho@cchvāsa mukho@tkīrṇa mukho@lkā

0163:mṛga:+kāka +kānana +ketana +kṣīra +gartā@śrayā@pcara +gāminī +grahaṇa +gharma-ja +cakra +carmīya +caryā +cārin +cirbhiṭā +caiṭaka +jambuka +jala +jāti +jālikā +jīvana +ṭaṅka +tīrtha +tṛṣ +tṛṣā +tṛṣṇā +tṛṣṇi +tṛṣṇikā +toya +tva +daṃśa +daṃśaka +darpa +dāva +dṛś +dyut +dyū +dvija +dviṣ +dhara +dharma +dharman +dhūma +dhūrta +dhūrtaka +nayanā +nābhi +nirmoka-vasana +netra +pakṣin +pati +pada +pālikā +piplu +pota +potaka +prabhu +priya +pre@kṣin +bandhinī +bālaka +bhakṣā +bhojanī +mattaka +mada +manda +mandra +maya +māṃsa +mātṛka +mātṛkā +māsa +mukha +yūtha +rasā +rāj +rāja +rājinī +rāṭikā +ripu +rūpin +rocanā +roma-ja +rkṣa +lakṣman +lāñchana +lipsu +lekhā +locana +lomika +vatī +vadhā@jīva +vadhā@jīvin +vadhū +vana +varman +vallabha +vāhana +vīthikā +vīthī +vaiṇika +vyādha +vyādhīya +vyāla-niṣevita +śapha +śāyikā +śāva +śāvaka +śāvā@kṣī +śira +śirā +śiras +śīrṣa +śīrṣan +śṛṅga +śreṣṭha +saktha +sattama +sattra +siṃhaka +sūkara +han +hantṛ mṛgā@kṣī mṛgā@khara mṛgā@khya mṛgā@ṅka mṛgā@ṅkaka mṛgā@ṅganā mṛgā@jina mṛgā@jira mṛgā@jīva mṛgā@ṭavī mṛgā@ṇḍakī mṛgā@ṇḍa-jā mṛgā@d mṛgā@da mṛgā@dana mṛgā@dhipa mṛgā@dhipatya mṛgā@dhirāja mṛgā@ntaka mṛgā@rāti mṛgā@ri mṛgā-vatī mṛgā@vidh mṛgā@śana mṛgā@ṣṭaka mṛgā@sya mṛge@kṣaṇa mṛge@ndra mṛge@ndrāṇī mṛge@bha mṛg-'ervāru mṛg-'ervāruka mṛge@śa mṛge@śa-vara-varman mṛge@śvara mṛge@ṣṭa mṛgai@rvāru mṛgai@rvāruka mṛgo@ttama mṛgo@ttama mṛgo@dbhava mṛgo@pā@khyāna

+nivāsin +niveśam +niśāntam yathā@nīkam yathā@nupūrvam yathā@nupūrvya yathā@nupūrvyā yathā@nubhūtam yathā@nurūpam yathā@ntaram +nyastam +nyāyam +nyāsam +nyupta +paṇyam +padam +param yathā@parādham 0195:yoga:+kakṣā +kanyā +kara +karaṇḍaka +kalpa-druma +kalpa-latā +kuṇḍalinī +kuṇḍaly-upaniṣad +kṣema +gati +gāmin +grantha +cakṣus +candra-ṭīkā +cara +caryā +cikitsā +cintāmaṇi +cūḍāmaṇi +cūḍāmaṇy-upaniṣad +cūḍo@paniṣad +cūrṇa +ja +jñāna +tattva +tantra +taraṃga +taraṃgiṇī +talpa +tas +tas +tas +tārakā +tārā +tva +daṇḍa +darpaṇa +dāna +dīpikā +dṛṣṭi-samuccaya-vyākhyā +deva +dharmin +dhāraṇā +nanda +nātha +nāvika +nidrā +nidrālu +nilaya +ṃ-dhara +nyāsa +paṭṭa +paṭṭaka +pati +patnī +patha +pada +padaka +paddhati +pātañjala +pādukā +pāraṃ-ga +pīṭha +prakāra +prakāśa-ṭīkā +pradīpa +pradīpikā +praveśa-vidhi +prā@pta +bala +bindu-ṭippaṇa +bīja +bhadrā +bhāraka +bhāvanā +bhāṣya +bhāskara +bhraṣṭa +mañjarī +maṇi-pradīpikā +maṇi-prabhā +maya +mahiman +mātṛ +māyā +mārga +mārtaṇḍa +mālā +muktā@valī +mūrtidhara +yājñavalkya +yājñavalkya-gītā +yājñavalkya-smṛti +yātrā +yukta +yukti +yuj +yogin +raṅga +ratna +ratha +rasā@yana +rahasya +rāja +rūḍha +rūḍhi-vāda +rūḍhi-vicāra +rocanā +rddhi-rūpa-vat +vat +varṇana +vartikā +vaha +vācaspatya +vārttika +vāsiṣṭha +vāsiṣṭhīya +vāha +vāhaka +vāhin +vikraya +vicāra +vid +vidyā +vibhāga +viveka +viṣaya +vṛtti-saṃgraha +śata +śataka +śataka-vyākhyāna +śatakā@khyāna +śabda +śarīrin +śāyin +śāstra +śikṣā +śikhā +śikho@paniṣad +saṃsiddhi +saṃgraha +samādhi +sāgara +sādhana +sāra +siddha +siddhi +sudhā@kara +sudhā-nidhi +sūtra +sevā +stha +svaro@daya +svāmin +hṛdaya yogā@kṣara-nighaṇṭu yogā@khyāna yogā@gni-maya yogā@ṅga yogā@cāra yogā@cārya yogā@ñjana yogā@tman yogā@dhamana-vikrīta yogā@dhikāra yogā@nanda yogā@nugatā yogā@nuśāsana yogā@nta yogā@ntikā yogā@patti yogā@bhyāsa-krama yogā@bhyāsa-prakaraṇa yogā@bhyāsa-lakṣaṇa yogā@mṛta yogā@mṛta-taraṃgiṇī yogā@mbara yogā@yoga yogāraṅga yogā@rūḍha yogā@rṇava yogā@vali yogā@valī yogā@valī-jātaka yogā@valī-tantre kula-dīpinī yogā@vāpa yogā@sana yoge@ndra yoge@śa yoge@śvara yoge@ṣṭa yogai@śvarya yogo@dvahana yogo@padeśa yogo@paniṣad

0171:ratha:+kaṭyā +kaḍyā +kara +kalpaka rathakāmya +kāya +kāra +kāraka +kuṭumba +kuṭumbika +kuṭumbin +kūbara +kṛcchra +kṛt +kṛtsna +ketu +krānta +krīta +kṣaya +kṣobha +gaṇaka +garbhaka +gupti +gṛtsa +gopana +granthi +ghoṣa +cakra +caraṇa +caryā +carṣaṇa +carṣaṇi +citra +jaṅghā +jit +jūti +jñāna +jvara +tur +dāna-vidhi +dāru +durga +dru +druma +dhur +dhurya +nābhi +nirghoṣa +nirhrāda +nisvana +nīḍa +nemi +ṃ-tara +patha +pada +paddhati +paryāya +pāda +puṃgava +praṇetṛ +pratiṣṭhā-vidhi +praṣṭha +prā +pro@ta +proṣṭha +psā +bandha +bhaṅga +bhṛt +maṇḍala +madhya +maho@tsava +mārga +mitra +mukha +yātaka +yātrā +yāna +yāvan +yuga +yuj +yuddha +yūtha +yoga +yojaka +yodha +raśmi +rāja +reṇu +reṣa +lakṣaṇa +vaṃśa +vat +vara +vartman +vāraka +vāha +vāhaka +vāhaṇa +vāhana +vijñāna +vidyā +vimocana +vīti +vīthī +vṛt +vega +vraja +vrāta +śakti +śālā +śikṣā +śiras +śīrṣa +śreṇi +saṅga +sattama +saptamī +sārathi +sā@hvayā +sūtra +stha +s-pati +spaṣṭa +spṛś +svana rathā@kṣa rathā@gra rathā@grya rathā@ṅkā rathā@ṅga rathā@nīka rathā@ntara rathā@bhirūḍhā rathā@bhra rathā@yudhaka rathā-rathi rathā@rūḍha rathā@roha rathā@rohin rathā@rbhaka rathāvaṭṭa rathā@vayava rathā@varta rathā@śman rathā@śva rathā@ṣṭamī rathā-sah rathā@has rathā@hna rathā@hnya rathā@hvā rathe-citra rathe@śa rathe-śubh rathe@ṣā rathe@ṣu rathe-ṣṭha rathe-ṣṭhā ratho@ḍupa ratho@ḍha ratho@ḷha ratho@ttama rathotsava ratho@ddhata ratho@dvaha ratho@pastha ratho@raga ratho@ṣmā rathau@gha rathau@jas

0231:rāma:+ṛṣi +kaṇṭha +kathā +karī +karṇā@mṛta +karpūra +karpūraka +kalpa +kavaca +kāṇḍa +kānta +kāvya +kiṃkara +kirī +kilbiṣa +kiśora +kīrī +kīrti-mukundamālā +kutūhala +kumāra +kṛt +kṛṣṇa +kelī 0039:lakṣa:+tā +tulasī-vrato@dyāpana +tulasy-udyāpana-vidhi +datta +dīpa-kalpa +dīpa-vrato@dyāpana +namaskāra-vidhi +namaskāra-vrata +padma-vrato@dyāpana +pārthiva-liṅga-vrato@dyāpana +pura +puṣpa-pūjo@dyāpana +puṣpa-vrata +puṣpavrato@dyāpana-vidhi +puṣpo@dhyāpana +pūjā-māhātmya +pūjo@dyāpana +pradakṣiṇa-vidhi +pradakṣiṇa-vrata-vidhi +bhūta +rāma-nāma-lekhana-vrata +varti-kathā +vartiko@dyāpana-vidhi +varti-dīpa-vrata-kalpa +varti-vrata +varty-udyāpana +varty-udyāpana-vidhāna +vedhin +śas +śloka +supta +svastika-vrata-kalpa +svastika-vrato@dyāpana +homa lakṣā@dhī@śa lakṣā@nta-purī lakṣā@ntara lakṣā@vatāra lakṣe@śa
0029:lakṣaṇa:+karman +kāṇḍa +grantha +jña +tva +dīpikā +prakāśa +praśasta +bhraṣṭa +ratna +ratna-mālikā +rājī +lakṣaṇā +vat +vāda +vṛtti +śataka +saṃgraha +saṃnipāta +saṃniveśa +samuccaya +sampad +sāra-samuccaya lakṣaṇā@nvita lakṣaṇā@mṛta lakṣaṇā@lakṣaṇa-tas lakṣṇā@valī lakṣaṇo@ttamā lakṣaṇo@ru

0003:lakṣī:lakṣīkṛ +kṛta lakṣībhū

0002:lakṣmi:+vardhana +sampanna
0076:lakṣmī:+kalpa +kavaca +kānta +kumāra-tātā@cārya +kula-tantra +kulā@rṇava +khaṇḍa +gṛha +candra-miśra +caritra +janā@rdana +tantra +tāla +tva +datta +dāsa +deva +dvādaśa-nāma-mahiman +dvādaśa-nāma-mahima-stotra +dhara +nara-siṃha +nātha +nāmā@mṛta +nārāyaṇa +niketana +nivāsa +nṛ-siṃha +ṃ-dadā +pañcāśat +pati +putra +pura +puruṣa-kāra +puṣpa +pūjana +pūjā +praṇayin +phala +bahiṣ-kṛta +mantra +mandira +yajus +ramaṇa +lahari +vat +varma-deva +vallabha +vasati +vākya +vāra +vinaya +vilāsa +vivarta +veṣṭa +vrata-pūjā lakṣmī@śa +śreṣṭhā lakṣmī@śvara-siṃha +saṃhitā +sakha +sanātha +saparyā-sāra +samāhvayā +sarasvatī +saha-ja +sahasranāman +sahasranāma-stotra +saho@dara +sū@kta +sena +stava +stuti +stotra +svayaṃvara-nāṭaka +hṛdaya +hṛdaya-stotra

0123:vasu:+karṇa +kalpa +kalpa-datta +kīṭa +kṛt +kṛmi +kra +gupta +guptā@cārya +candra +carita +cchidrā +jit +jyeṣṭha +tā +tāti +tti +tva +tvana +da +datta +dattaka +dā +dāna +dāma +dāman +dāvan +deya +deva +devata +devyā +daiva +daivata +dhara +dharman +dharmikā +dhā +dhātu-kārikā +dhāna +dhāra +dhāriṇī +dhita +dhiti +dheya +nanda +nandaka +nāga +nīti +nītha +netra +nemi +ṃ-dhara +ṃ-dharā +pati +patnī +pātṛ +pāla +pālita +pūjya-rāj +prada +prabhā +prā@ṇa +bandhu +bha +bhaṭṭa +bharita +bhāga +bhūta +bhūti +bhṛd-yāna +mat +mati +matī +manas +maya +mitra +mekhala +rakṣita +raṇva +ratha +rāja +rāta +ruc +ruci +rūpa +retas +rocis +lakṣmī +vat +van +vana +vani +varma-dhara +vallikā +vāha +vāhana +vid +vinda +vīrya +vṛṣṭi +vrata +śakti +śravas +śrī +śruta +śreṣṭha +ṣeṇa +sampatti +sampūrṇa +sāra +sena +sthalī +haṭṭa +haṭṭaka +homa vasū-jū vasū@ttama vasū@dreka vasū@pamāna vasū-matī vasor-dhārā vasor-dhārā-prayoga vasoṣ-pati
0002:vasūya VERB:vasūyā vasūyu
0004:vasv:+ananta +anta +okasārā +aukasārā
0006:vasana:+paryāya +maya +vat +sadman vasanā@rṇa vasanā@rṇava
0001:vasitṛ:+tama
0054:vastra:+kuṭṭima +kośa +knopam +gṛha +gopana +granthi +ghargharī +cchanna +da +daśā +dā +dāna +dhāraka +dhāraṇī +dhāvin +nirṇejaka +pa +pañjala +paridhāna +putrikā +pūta +peṭā +peśī +bandha +bhūṣaṇa +bhedaka +bhedin +mathi +mukhya +yugala +yugin +yugma +yoni +raṅgā +rajaka +rajanī +rañjana +vat +vidyā +vilāsa +veśa +veśman +veṣṭita vastrā@gāra vastrā@ñcala vastrā@dhāraka vastrā@nta vastrā@ntara vastrā@patha-kṣetra vastrā@pahāraka vastrā@pahārin vastrā@rdha vastrā@vakarta vastro@tkarṣaṇa

0169:viṣṇu:+ṛkṣa +kanda +karaṇa +kavaca +kāñcī +kāntī +kāntī-tīrtha +kutūhala +kośala +krama +kramīya +krānta +krānti +kṣetra +gaṅgā +gāthā +gāyatrī +gupta +guptaka +gūḍha +gṛha +gopa-varman +gola +granthi +cakra +candra +citta +ja +jāmala +jāmātṛ +tattva +tantra +tarpaṇa +tarpaṇa-vidhi +tātparya-nirṇaya +tithi +tīrtha +tīrthīya-vyākhyāna +tulya-parākrama +taila +toṣiṇī +triśatī +tva +datta +dattaka +dāsa +deva +devatya +daivata +daivatya +dvādaśa-nāma-stotra +dviṣ +dvīpa +dharma +dharman +dhārā +dhyāna-stotrā@di +nadī +nāma-māhātmya-saṃgraha +nāmaratna-stotra +nīrājana +nyaṅga +pañcaka +pañcaka-vrata-kathā +pañjara +pati +patnī +pada +paddhati +parā@yaṇa +parṇikā +pādā@di-keśā@nta-stuti +putra +pur +pura +purāṇa +purāṇaka +pūjana +pūjā +pratimā-sampro@kṣaṇa-vidhi +pratiṣṭhā +pratiṣṭhā-paddhati +priyā +prīti +brahma-mahe@śvara-dāna-prayoga +bha +bhakta +bhakti +bhāgavata-purāṇa +bhujaṃ-ga +bhujaṃga-stotra +bhujaṃgī +mat +mantra +mandira +maya +mahiman +mānasa +māyā +māhātmya +māhātmya-paddhati +mitra +mukha +yantra-prakaraṇa +yaśas +yāga +yāga-prayoga +yāmala +yāmala-tantra viṣṇuyāmila +ratha +rahasya +rāja +rāta +rāma +rāma-siddhā@nta-vāg-īśa +laharī +liṅgī +loka +vat +vat +varṇanadhyānā@di +vardhana +varman +vallabha +vāhana +vāhya +vigraha-śaṃsana-stotra +vijaya +vṛddha +vrata-kalpa +śakti +śata-nāma-stotra +śayana-bodha-dina +śarman +śilā +śṛṅkhala +śrāddha +śrāddha-paddhati +śruta +ṣaṭpadī +saṃhitā +samuccaya +saras +saras-tīrtha +sarvajana +sarva-jña +sahasra-nāman +siṃha +siddhā@nta +siddhā@nta-līlā-vatī +sū@kta +sūtra +stava +stava-rāja +stuti +stotra +smṛti +sva-rūpa-dhyānā@di-varṇana +svāmin +hari +hāra-deva +hitā +hṛdaya +hṛdaya-stotra viṣṇū@ttara viṣṇū@tsava viṣṇū@pā@dhyāya viṣṇū-varuṇa

0114:vṛddha:+karman +kāka +kātyāyana +kāla +kāverī +kumārī-vākya-vara-nyāya +kṛcchra +keśava +koṭara-puṣpī +kola +kośa +kauśika +krama +kṣatra +kṣetra-vara-locana +kṣema +gaṅgā +garga +garbhā +gārga +gārgīya +gārgya +giri-māhātmya +gonasa +gautama +cāṇakya +jātaka +tama +tā +tva +dāra +dāraka +dāru +dyumna +dvija-rūpin +dhūpa +nagara +nābhi +nyāsa +parāśara +pārāśarīya +pārāśarya +pradhāna +prapitāmaha +pramātāmaha +balā +bāla +bālaka +bṛhaspati +baudhāyana +brahma-saṃhitā +brāhmaṇo@paniṣad-bhāṣya +bhāva +bhoja +mata +manu +mahas +yavana +yājñavalkya +yuvati +yoga-taraṃgiṇī +yoga-śataka +yoṣit +raṅka +rāja +vayas +vasiṣṭha +vāg-bhaṭa +vāda-sūri +vādin +vāśinī +vāhana +viṭa +vibhītaka +viṣṇu +vīvadhā +vṛṣṇa +vṛṣṇiya +vega +vaiyākaraṇa-bhūṣaṇa +śaṅkha +śabda-ratnaśekhara +śavas +śākalya +śātā@tapa +śīlin +śocis +śaunakī +śravas +śrāvaka +saṃgha +suśruta +sūtraka +sṛgāla +sena +sevā +sevin +hārīta vṛddhā@ṅguli vṛddhā@ṅguṣṭha vṛddhā@cala vṛddhā@tri vṛddhā@treya vṛddhā@ditya vṛddhā@nuśāsana vṛddhā@nta vṛddhā@yu vṛddhā@raṇya vṛddhā@rka vṛddhā@ryabhaṭa vṛddhā@vasthā vṛddhā@śrama vṛddho@kṣa vṛddho@pasevin

0069:vṛṣa:+karṇikā +karṇī +kṛta +ketana +ketu +ga +gandhā +gāyatrī +cakra +tā +tva +daṃśa +daṃśaka +dat +danta +darbha +dāna +deva +dvīpa +dhara +dhvaja +dhvāṅkṣī +nādin +nāśana +pati +pattrikā +parṇī +parvan +puṣpa +pūtana +bhānu +bhāsā +rāja +rāja-ketana +lakṣaṇā +lāñchana +locana +vat +vāha +vāhana +vivāha +vṛṣa +śatru +śīla +śuṣṇa +ṣaṇḍa +sānu +sā@hvayā +sā@hvā +sṛkkin +sena +skandha vṛṣā@kara vṛṣā@kṛti vṛṣā@krāntā vṛṣā@kṣa vṛṣā@khya vṛṣā@ṅka vṛṣā@ñcana vṛṣā@ṇḍa vṛṣā@dri vṛṣā@ntaka vṛṣā@mitra vṛṣā@vāha vṛṣā@hāra vṛṣe@ndra vṛṣo@tsarga vṛṣo@tsāha vṛṣo@dara

0032:vraṇa:+kārin +kṛt +ketu-ghnī +granthi +ghna-gaja-dāna-vidhi +ghna-ratna-dāna-vidhi +ghnī +cikitsā +cintaka +jitā +tā +dviṣ +dhūpana +paṭṭa +paṭṭaka +paṭṭikā +bhṛt +maya +yukta +vat +vastu +viropaṇa +vedanā +śodhana +śoṣin +saṃrohaṇa +sāmānya-karma-prakāśa +ha +hṛt vraṇā@yāma vraṇā@ri vraṇā@srāva

0104:vrata:+kamalā@kara +kalpa +kalpa-druma +kāla-nirṇaya +kāla-viveka +kośa +kaumudī +khaṇḍa +grahaṇa +caryā +cārin +cārya +cūḍāmaṇi +tattva +daṇḍin +dāna +dugdha +dughā +duh +dhara +dhāraṇa +dhārin +nimitta +nirṇaya +nī +pakṣa +pañjī +pati +patnī +pā +pāraṇa +pāraṇā +pustaka +prakāśa +pratiṣṭhā +prada +pradāna +bandha-paddhati +bhakṣaṇa +bhaṅga +bhikṣā +bhṛt +mayūkha +mālā +miśra +mīmāṃsā +ratnā@valī +rāja +ruci +lupta +lopa +lopana +vat +vat +vallī +vidhi +viveka-bhāskara +visarga +visarjana +visarjanīyo@payoga +vaikalya +śayyā-gṛha +śānti +śeṣa +śrapaṇa +saṃrakṣaṇa +saṃgraha +samāpana +samāyana +sampāta +sampādana +sahyā@dri +sāra +stha +sthita +snāta +snātaka +snāna +hāni vratā@caraṇa vratā@cāra vratā@tipatti vratā@dāna vratā@dānīya vratā@deśa vratā@deśana vratā@rka vratā@valī vratā@valī-kalpa vratā@vṛtti vratā@śa vrate@śa vrato@ddyota vrato@dyāpana vrato@dyāpana-kaumudī vrato@dyāpana-vidhi vrato@panayana vrato@pavāsa vrato@pasad vrato@paha vrato@pā@yana vrato@pāyanīya vrato@pe@ta vrato@po@ha

0082:śva:+kaṇṭaka +karṇa +kiṣkin +krīḍin +kharo@ṣṭra +gaṇa +gaṇika +gaṇin +gardabha +graha +graha-gṛhīta +graha-prā@yaścitta +ghnī +cakra +caṇḍāla +caryā +cillī +jāghanī +jīvana +jīvikā +jīvin +daṃṣṭraka +daṃṣṭrā +daṃṣṭrin +dayita +dṛti +dhūrta +nakula +nara +niśa +nī +pa +paka +pac +paca +pati +pad +pada +pāka +pāda +pāmana +puccha +poṣaka +phala +phalka +bāla +bhakṣa +bhakṣya +bhīru +bhojana +bhojin +māṃsa +mukha +yātu +yūtha +yūthya +rūpa-dhārin +lih +lehya +lominī +vat +vat +varta +vāla +viṣṭhā +vṛtti +vṛttin +vyāghra +śīrṣa +suta +suna +sṛgāla +spṛṣṭa +hata +han +hāna śvā@gra śvā@jina śvā@da śvā@nala śvā@śva śvā@hi

0202:śveta:+kaṇṭakārī +kaṇṭhin +kanda +kapota +kamala +karṇa +kalpa +kāka +kākīya +kāṇḍā +kāpotī +kāmbojī +kiṇihī +kukṣi +kuñjara +kuśa +kuṣṭha +kṛṣṇā +ketu +keśa +kola +kolaka +kṣāra +khadira +gaṅgā +gaja +garut +garuta +giri +guñjā +guṇavat +gokarṇī +godhūma +ghaṇṭā +ghaṇṭī +ghoṣā +candana +campaka +caraṇa +cintā-maṇi +cillikā +cillī +cchattra śvetacchattrāya +cchattrin +cchada +jala +jīraka +ṭaṅkaka +ṭaṅkaṇa +taṇḍula +tantrī +tapas +tara +tā +dūrvā +dyuti +druma +dvipa +dvīpa śvetadvīpāya +dhātu +dhāman +nāman +nīla +nyaṅga +pakṣa +paṭa +pattra +padma +parṇa +parṇā@sa +parvata +pākī +pāṭalā +pāda +piṅga +piṅgala +piṅgalaka +piṇḍītaka +pītala +puṅkhā +punarnavā +puṣpa +puṣpaka +prasūnaka +phalā +barbara +balā +bindukā +buhnā +bṛhatī +bhaṇḍā +bhadra +bhasman +bhānu +bhikṣu +bhiṇḍā +bhujaṃga +maṇḍala +madhya +mandāra +mandāraka +mayūkha +marica +mahoṭikā +māṇḍavya +mādhava +mādhava-tīrtha +māla +mūtra +mūla +mūlā +mṛd +meha +moda +yāvarī +rakta +rañjana +ratha +raśmi +rasa +rājī +rāvaka +rāsnā +rūpya +rocis +roman +rohita +lodhra +lohita +vaktra +vacā +vatsā +varṇa +valkala +vastrin +vah +vājin +vārāha +vārija +vārttākī +vāsas +vāh +vāha +vāhana +vāhin +vṛkṣa +vrata +śara-puṅkhā +śāla +śiṃśapā +śikha +śigru +śimbikā +śīrṣa +śuṅga +śūraṇa +śṛṅga +śaila +śyāma +sarpa +sarṣapa +sāra +siṃhī +siddha +surasā +spandā +hanu +haya +hastin +hūṇa śvetā@ṃśu śvetā@ṃśuka śvetā@kṣa śvetā@ñjana śvetā@ṇḍa śvetā@tapatra śvetā-trivṛt śvetā@treya śvetā@dri śvetā@nukāśa śvetā@nulepana śvetā@nūkāśa śvetā@parājita-kalpa śvetā@mbara śvetā@mlī śvetā@raṇya śvetā@rka śvetā@rcis śvetā@rdha-vaktra śvetā@vara śvetā@śva śvetā@śvatara śvetā@sthi śvetā@sya śvetā@hvā śvete@kṣu śvetai@raṇḍa śveto@tpala śveto@dara śveto@pakāśa

0103:samāna:+karaṇa +kartṛka +kartṛ-tva +karmaka +karman +kāraka +kāraṇa +kāla +kālīna +kṣema +khyāna +gati +guṇa +gotra +grāma +grāmīya +jana +janman +janya +jāti +jātīya +jñātitva-maya +tantra +tas +tā +tejas +tra +tva +dakṣa +dakṣiṇa +duḥkha +dṛś +devata +devatya +dharman +dhiṣṇya +nāman +nidhana +pakṣa +pātra +pratipatti +prabhṛti samānaprayojana +pravara-grantha +prasiddhi +preman +bandhu +barhis +bala +brahma-cārin +brāhmaṇa +brāhmaṇīya +bhṛt +māna +mūrdhan +yama +yoga-kṣema +yojana +yoni +ruci +rūpa samānarṣi +loka +vacana +vayas +vayaska +varcas +varcasa +varṇa +vasana +vidya +vrata-cārin +vrata-bhṛt +śabdā +śayya +śākhīya +śīla +saṃkhya +sambandhana +salila +sukha-duḥkha +sūtra-nipāta +stotriya +sthāna samānā@kṣara samānā@khyāna samānā@cārya samānā@dhikaraṇa samānā@dhikāra samānā@bhihāra samānā@rtha samānā@rthaka samānā@rṣa-pravara samānā@rṣeya samānā@laṃkāra samānā@sya-prayatna samāno@ttama-madhyamā@dhama samāno@daka samāno@darka samāno@darya samāno@pamā samāno@pā@dhyāya samāno@lba

0214:saha:+ṛṣabha +kaṇṭhaka +karaṇa +kartṛ +kāra +kārin +kṛt +kṛta +kṛtvan +kramya +khaṭvā@sana +gata +gamana +gāmin +gu +guḍa +gopa +candra-lalāma +cara +caraṇa +carat +carita +cāra +cārin +caitya-vat +cchandas +ja +jagdhi +janman +janya +jā +jāta +jāni +jānuṣa +jit +jīvin +joṣaṇa +tā +tva +daṇḍa +dāna +dānu +dāra +dīkṣitin +deva +devata +devi +droṇa +dharma +dharman +dharmin +dhānya +nartana +nirvāpa +nivāsin +nṛtya +nau +patni +patnī +patnīka +pathin +pāṃsu-kila +pāṃsu-krīḍana +pāṃsu-krīḍita +pāṭha +pāna +pānaka +piṇḍa-kriyā +pīti +putra +puruṣa +pūruṣa +pūrvāhṇam +prakṛti +prakḷpti +prama +prayāyin +prayoga +pravāda +prathāyin +bāndhava +bhakṣa +bhasman +bhārya +bhāva +bhāvanika +bhāvin +bhuj +bhū +bhūta +bhūti +bhojana +bhojin +bhrātṛ +manas +maraṇa +marmā@sthi-saṃghāta +mātṛka +māda +māna +mārīca +mitra +mukha +mūra +mūla +mṛtā +yajña +yaśas +yāta +yāyin +yuj +yudhvan +yoṣit +yaugaṃdharāyaṇa +rakṣa +rakṣas +rasā +rājaka +rṣabha +lakṣmaṇa +loka-dhātu +vatsa +vartin +vasati +vasu +vah +vācya +vāda +vārṣṇeya-jīvala +vārṣṇeya-bāhuka +vārṣṇeya-sārathi +vāsa +vāsika +vāsin +vāhana +vivakṣā +vīra +vīrya +vṛddhi-kṣaya-bhāva +vaiśikya +vrata +śaya +śayyā +śayyā@sanā@śana +śiṣṭa +śeyya +saṃvāda +saṃvāsa +saṃvega +saṃsarga +saṃjāta-vṛddha +sambhalā +sambhava +sāman +siddha +sura-lalanā-lalāma-yūtha-pati +sū@kta-vāka +sevin +soma +saumitri +stoma +stha +sthāna +sthita +sthiti +sphya +huta sahā-cara sahā@jya sahā@daram sahā@dhyayana sahā@dhyāyin sahā@nugamana sahā@nuja sahā@numaraṇa sahā@patya sahā@pavā@da sahā@mātya sahā@ya sahā@yatana sahā@rambha sahā@rogya sahā@rjuna sahā@rtha sahā@rdha sahā@lāpa sahā@vasthita sahā@śrāya sahā@sana sahā@syā sahe@ti sahe@ti-karaṇa sahe@ti-kāra sahe@ndra sahai@ka-sthana saho@kti saho@ṭaja saho@ḍha saho@ttha saho@tthāyin saho@tpatti saho@daka saho@da-kumbha sah'odana saho@daya saho@dara saho@dita saho@padha saho@papati-veśman saho@pamā saho@palambha saho@ru saho@ṣita sahau@jas

0222:sahasra:+ka +kaṃdhara-rāmā@yaṇa +kara +kara-pan-netra +kalaśa-snapanā@di +kalaśā@bhiṣeka-prayoga +kalā +kavaca +kāṇḍa +kiraṇa +kuṇapa +kṛtvas +ketu +gaṇa-nāman +gīti +gu +guṇa +guṇita +godāna-paddhati +ghātin +ghni +cakṣas +cakṣu +cakṣus +caṇḍī-vidhāna +caṇḍī-vidhi +caṇḍī-śata-caṇḍī-vidhāna +caṇḍy-ādi-prayoga-paddhati +caṇḍy-ādi-vidhi +caraṇa +citya +cetas +jaladhāra +jit +jihva +jyotis +ṇī +ṇīti +ṇītha +tama +da +daṃṣṭra +daṃṣṭrin +dakṣiṇa +dala +dā +dātu +dāna +dāvan +dīdhiti +dṛś +dos +dvār +dvāra +dhā +dhāman +dhāyas +dhāra +dhāra +dhī +dhauta +nayana +nāman +nirṇij +nītha +netra +pati +pattra +pad +parama +parṇa +parvā +pākya +pājas +pāthas +pād +pāda +pāśa sahasraputra +pūraṇa +pṛṣṭha +poṣa +poṣā +poṣa +poṣin +poṣya +prakāra +pradhana +prā@ṇa +bala +bāhavīya +bāhu +buddhi +bhakta +bhara +bharṇas +bhāgavatī +bhānu +bhāva +bhid +bhuja +bhṛṣṭi +bheda-śas +maṅgala +manyu +marīci +mīḍha +mīḷha +mukha +muṣka +m-ūti +mūrti +mūrdha +mūrdhan +mūla +mauli +m-bhara +m-bhari +yajña +yāj +yājin +yāman +yuga +yoga +yoga-cikitsā +yojana +raśmi +ruc +retas +roman +liṅgī +locana +vaktra +vat +vadana +varcas +vartani +vartanin +vartman +valiśa +valśa +vāka +vāc +vāja +vīra +vīrya +vṛt +vedha +vedhin +śakti +śata-dakṣiṇa +śala +śas +śākha +śikhara +śiras +śirasa +śīrṣa +śīrṣan +śṛṅga +śokas +śravaṇa +śruti +saṃvatsara +saṃkhya +saṃkhyāka +sani +sama +sammita +sava +sā +sāva +sāvya +sīta +stari +stuka +stuti +stotriya +sthūṇa +srota +srotas +ha +hary-aśva +hary-āśva +hasta sahasrā@ṃśu sahasrā@kṣa sahasrā@kṣara sahasrā@khya sahasrā@ṅka sahasrā@cāra sahasrā-jit sahasrā@ṇīka sahasrā@tṛṇṇa sahasrā@tman sahasrā@dhipati sahasrā@nana sahasrā@nīka sahasrā-poṣa sahasrā@psas sahasrā-magha sahasrā@yu sahasrā@yutīya sahasrā@yudha sahasrā@yus sahasrā@ra sahasrā@rgha sahasrā@rcis sahasrā@rha sahasrā@vara sahasrā@vartaka-tīrtha sahasrā@vartā sahasrā@śva sahasrā@śvīna sahasrā@sya sahasrā@ha sahasrā@hnya sahasre@kṣaṇa sahasre@dhma sahasro@ti sahasro@paniṣad sahasro@rv-aṅghri-bāhv-akṣa

0090:sāra:+kalikā +kaumudī +kṣetra-māhātmya +kṣetra-māhātmya-sāro@ddhāra +khadira +ga +gandha +gātra +gītā +guṇa +guru +graha-mañjarī +grāha +grāhin +grīva +caturviṃśatikā +candrikā +cintāmaṇi +ja +taṇḍula +tama +tara +taru +tas +tā +traya-culuka +tva +darśin +dā +dāru +dīpikā +druma +dhātṛ +dhānya +dhvaji +pattra +pada +padyā@valī +parṇī +pāka +pādapa +prakāśikā +pradīpikā +phalgu +bodhinī +bhaṅga +bhaṭa +bhaṭṭāraka +bhāṇḍa +bhuj +bhūta +bhṛt +bhoga +mañjarī +maya +mahat +mārgaṇa +miti +mūṣikā +yoga +yodha +rūpa +laharī +loha +vat +varjita +vastu +vid +śūnya +saṃhitā +saṃgraha +samuccaya +sambandha-paddhati +sāgara +siddhā@nta-kaumudī +sindhu +sundarī sārā@dāna sārā@parādha sārā@pahāra sārā@mṛta sārā@mbhas sārā@rtha-saṃgraha sārā@rthin sārā@valī sārā@śīti sārā@sāra sārā@svādinī sāre@śvara sāro@ddhāra

0231:sukha:+kara +kāra +kārin +kṛt +kaumudī +kriyā +ga +gandha +gama +gamya +grāhya +ghātya +ṃ-kara +cara +cāra +citta +cchāya +cchedya +jāta +tama +tara +tas +tā +tva +da +dāyaka +duḥkha +dṛśya +deva +dohā +dohyā +dhana +nātha +niviṣṭa +para +parihīna +puṇyā@ha-ghoṣa +peya +prakāśa +praṇāda +pratibandhin +pratī@kṣa +pratyarthin +prada +prabodhaka +pravicāra +pravepa +praśna +prasava +prasavana +prasupta +prā@pta +prā@pta-dhana +prā@pya +pre@kṣya +plava +baddha +bandhana +buddhi +bodha +bodhana +bodhikā +bodhinī +bhakṣikā-kāra +bhañja +bhāga +bhāgin +bhāj +bhuj +bhū +bhedya +bhoga +bhogin 0178:sura:+ṛṣi +karin +kāminī +kāru +kārmuka +kārya +kāṣṭha +kula +kṛt +kṛta +ketu +khaṇḍanikā +gaja +gaṇa +gaṇḍa +gati +garbha +gāyaka +gāyana +giri +guru +gṛha +grāmaṇī +cāpa +jana +jā +jit +jyeṣṭha +taraṃgiṇī +taru +tā +tuṅga +toṣaka +dāru +dīrghikā +dundubhi +devatā +devin +dru +druma +dvipa suradvipa +dviṣ +dhanus +dhāman +dhunī +dhūpa +dhvaja +nadī +nandā +nāyaka +nāla +nimnagā +nirgandha +nirjhariṇī +nilaya +pati +patha +parṇa +parṇika +parṇikā +parvata +pāṃsulā +pādapa +pāla +puṃnāga +pura +purodhas +puṣpa +pratiṣṭhā +pravīra +priya +bhavana +bhāva +bhī +bhuvana +bhūya +bhūruha +bhūṣaṇa +maṇḍalikā +mantrin +mandira +muni +mūla +mṛttikā +medā +mohinī +yāna +yuvati +yoṣit +rāj +rāja +rājan +rājya +ripu +rṣabha +rṣi +latā +lāsikā +loka +vadhū +vana +vara +varcas +vartman +varman +vallabha +vallī +vāhinī +vidviṣ +vilāsinī +vīthī +velā +veśman +vairin +śatru +śākhin +śilpin +śreṣṭha +śvetā +sakha +saṃgha +sattama +sadana +sadman +sama +samiti +sambhavā +sarit +sarṣapaka +sindhu +suta +sundara +skandha +strī +sthāna +sravantī +srotasvinī surā@ṅganā surā@cārya surā@jīva surā@dri surā@dhama surā@dhipa surā@dhī@śa surā@dhyakṣa surā@naka surā@nanda surā@pagā surā@yudha surā@raṇi surā@ri surā@rcana surā@rdana surā@rha surā@rhaka surā@laya surā@vani surā@valī surā@vāsa surā@śraya surā@sura surā@spada surā@hva surā@hvaya sure@jya sure@tara sure@ndra sure@ndraka sure@bha sure@śa sure@śvara sure@ṣṭa sure@ṣṭaka suro@ttama suro@ttara suro@pama surau@kas

0013:svadhā:+kara +kāra sva-dhā@dhipa +ninayana +pati +prā@ṇa +priya +bhājin +bhuj +maya sva-dhā@mṛta-maya +vat sva-dhā@śana
0052:svayaṃ:+yāna +vakra +vara +varaṇa +varayitrī +vaśa +vaha +vāda +vānta +vikrīta +vilīna +viśīrṇa +vṛta +vedana +vyakta-sthala-stotra +śīrṇa +śṛta +śreṣṭha +saṃyoga +saṃviddha +sambhṛta +siddha +sras +srasta +hāra-karī +hārikā +hārī +hotṛ +homa +kartṛka +kṛta +kṛtin +kṛṣṭa +krānta +khāta +guṇa-parityāga +guptā +gurutva +graha +grahaṇa +grāha +grāhya +citi +ja +jāta +jyotis +tyakta +datta +dāna +dina +dṛś +nirdiṣṭa
0052:svayam:+agurutva +adhigata +anuṣṭhāna +apo@dita +abhigūrta +arjita +avadīrṇa +avapanna +āgata +ātṛṇṇa +ānīta +āsana-ḍhaukana +āhṛta +āhṛtya-bhojin +indriya-mocana +īśvara +īhita-labdha +ukti +ujjvala +udita +udgīrṇa +udghāṭita +udyata +upasthita +upā@gata +upe@ta +patita +pāṭha +pāpa +prakāśa +prakāśamāna +prajvalita +pradīrṇa +prabha +prabhu +praśīrṇa +prastuta +pro@kta +bodha +bhagna +bhu +bhuva +bhū +bhūta +bhṛta +bhoja +bhrami +bhramin +mathita +mūrta +mṛta +mlāna

0025:hariṇa:+kalaṅka +carman +dhāman +nayanā +nartaka +pṛṇākā +pluta +plutā +lakṣaṇa +lakṣman +lāñchana +locanā +lolā@kṣī +hṛdaya hariṇā@krīḍana hariṇā@krīḍita hariṇā@kṣa hariṇā@ṅka hariṇā@dhipa hariṇā@ntara hariṇā@yate@kṣaṇā hariṇā@ri hariṇā@śva hariṇe@kṣaṇā hariṇe@śa

0035:homa:+karman +kalpa +kāla +kāṣṭhī +kuṇḍa +tattva-vidhi +tarpaṇa-vidhi +turaṃga +darpaṇa-vidhi +darvī +duh +dravya +dvaya-prayoga +dvaya-samāsa-prayoga +dhānya +dhūma +dhenu +nirṇaya +paddhati +prā@yaścitta +bhasman +bhāṇḍa +mantra-bhāṣya +yūpa +lopa-prā@yaścitta-prayoga +vat +vidhāna +vidhi +velā +śālā +svaro@ttara homā@gni homā@nala homā@rjunī home@ndhana
